content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "google" command to search for the best lodging and equipment rental options for kayaking in Norway. My computer returned a list of websites including blisterreview.com, dnr.state.mn.us, and preikestolenbasecamp.com. I then used the "browse_website" command to gather more information from https://www.visitnorway.com/things-to-do/outdoor-activities/canoeing-kayaking/ and found that it provides information on kayaking and other outdoor activities in Norway, emphasizing safety and local knowledge. It offers tips and recommendations for kayaking, including top destinations and rental options, and also provides information on accommodations and transportation. Additionally, it gives a general overview of other outdoor activities available in Norway.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Best lodging and equipment rental options for kayaking in Norway near Naeroyfjord"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://freewildsouls.com/destination/kayaking-naeroyfjord", "https://www.visitnorway.com/things-to-do/nature-attractions/fjords/the-fjords-explained/", "https://nordicventures.com/norway-tours/kayak-rentals/", "https://www.visitnorway.com/things-to-do/outdoor-activities/canoeing-kayaking/", "https://freewildsouls.com/destination/norway-roadtrip", "https://www.helenonherholidays.com/norway-in-a-nutshell-tips-advice/", "https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attraction_Review-g230076-d2203765-Reviews-Njord_Seakayak_and_Wildernes_Adventures-Flam_Aurland_Municipality_Sogn_og_Fjordan.html", "https://nordicventures.com/"]', type='action_result')]
"""
